TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SettingsAllowAnonymousAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class SettingsAllowAnonymousAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class SettingsAllowAnonymousAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 識別匿名使用者是否能設定或存取設定檔屬性。

span.span: Identifies whether a profile property can be set or accessed for an anonymous user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別用來識別是否可存取的自訂設定檔實作的屬性，如果使用者是匿名使用者。The class is used to identify whether a property of a custom profile implementation can be accessed if the user is an anonymous user. 如需啟用匿名識別的資訊，請參閱提供的文件[anonymousIdentification](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/91ka2e6a(v%3dvs.100))組態項目。For information about enabling anonymous identification, see the documentation provided for the [anonymousIdentification](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/91ka2e6a(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element. 如果沒有指定不允許設定檔屬性，設定檔屬性的匿名存取。If no is specified for a profile property, anonymous access of the profile property is not allowed. 自訂設定檔實作是繼承自類別抽象類別，並定義屬性中未指定的使用者設定檔[設定檔](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100))組態項目。A custom profile implementation is a class that inherits from the abstract class and defines properties for the user profile that are not specified in the [profile](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element. 您可以使用的應用程式的 Web.config 檔案中指定自訂的使用者設定檔類型`inherits`的屬性[設定檔](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100))組態項目，如下列範例所示。You can specify a custom user-profile type in the application's Web.config file with the `inherits` attribute of the [profile](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element as shown in the following example. ```xml ``` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會定義類別繼承自建立自訂設定檔。The following code example defines a class that inherits from the to create a custom profile. 已在指定的自訂設定檔類型`inherits`的屬性[設定檔](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100))應用程式的 Web.config 檔案中的組態項目。The type of the custom profile is specified in the `inherits` attribute of the [profile](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element in the Web.config file for an application. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase/CS/employeeprofile.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase/VB/employeeprofile.vb#1)]

summary.span: 建立 類別的新執行個體，並指定是否允許匿名存取相關的設定檔屬性。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class and specifies whether to allow anonymous access to the associated profile property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別用來識別是否可存取的自訂設定檔實作的屬性，如果使用者是匿名使用者。The class is used to identify whether a property of a custom profile implementation can be accessed if the user is an anonymous user. 啟用匿名識別的相關資訊，請參閱[anonymousIdentification](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/91ka2e6a(v%3dvs.100))組態項目。For information about enabling anonymous identification, see the [anonymousIdentification](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/91ka2e6a(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element. 如果沒有指定不允許設定檔屬性，設定檔屬性的匿名存取。If no is specified for a profile property, anonymous access to the profile property is not allowed. 自訂設定檔實作是繼承自類別抽象類別，並定義屬性中未指定的使用者設定檔[設定檔](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100))組態項目。A custom profile implementation is a class that inherits from the abstract class and defines properties for the user profile that are not specified in the [profile](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element. ## Examples 下列範例會定義類別繼承自類別來建立自訂的設定檔。The following example defines a class that inherits from the class to create a custom profile. 已在指定的自訂設定檔類型`inherits`的屬性[設定檔](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100))應用程式的 Web.config 檔案中的組態項目。The type of the custom profile is specified in the `inherits` attribute of the [profile](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element in the Web.config file for an application. 如需組態檔中指定的自訂設定檔實作的範例，請參閱類別概觀。For an example of a configuration file that specifies a custom profile implementation, see the class overview. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase/CS/employeeprofile.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase/VB/employeeprofile.vb#1)]
